attributes.action: Place restrictions on HGV and other speed limited vehicles over-taking on some sections of the motorway such as is present on the continent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that a restriction be placed on HGVs and other speed limited vehicles over-taking on some sections of the motorways such as is present on the continent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
